ygData.subject: Itan introduces himself.  Of course, you are listening.
ygData.msgSnippet: I am Itan the Whistler. I hail from Erudin, where I have recently began plying my trade as a wizard. Although I am, as you all are, of humble beginnings, I am
ygData.messageBody:
I am Itan the Whistler.

I hail from Erudin, where I have recently began plying my trade as a wizard.

Although I am, as you all are, of humble beginnings, I am so intelligent that I simply cannot fail to become the mightiest wizard that ever walked the lands of Norrath.

If you are Erudite, and are not a death peddling Necro, then you may count me as a friend. My ears are always open, and my powers are at your service.

If you are of the lesser races, then bow before my mighty intellect and humble thyself appropriately.

If you are a Necro of any race, then I swear to smite you and all your family from Norrath in due course.

Remember my name. One day it will matter.
